mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_OPTION_NO, ITEM_OPTION_NAME, ITEM_OPTION_PRICE, ITEM_OPTION_STOCK, ITEM_OPTION_SOLD_COUNT, ITEM_OPTION_CRE_DATE, ITEM_NO FROM ITEM_OPTION WHERE ITEM_NO = #{itemNo} AND ITEM_OPTION_STATE = '활성화' ORDER BY ITEM_OPTION_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM_OPTION VALUE(ITEM_OPTION_NO, ITEM_OPTION_NAME, ITEM_OPTION_PRICE, ITEM_OPTION_STOCK, ITEM_NO) VALUES(ITEM_OPTION_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{itemOptionName}, #{itemOptionPrice}, #{itemOptionStock}, #{itemNo})
